name: Jess Dweck

activity.content: I refuse to be told what’s disturbing by the guy responsible for Disney adults
activity.parent_content: Disney CEO Bob Iger Says Writers and Actors Are Not Being 'Realistic' With Strikes: 'It's Very Disturbing to Me'

activity.content: May I never die in a way that requires an explanatory infographic
This is actually Grimace's first birthday. One Grimace year is equal to 52 human years. It’s also his last birthday and he will be dead next Thursday
